review_title: Worked 3 years with Marie Stopes. Lead SM channel, create awareness & demand for the social marketing commodities.
pros:
-Best work environment
-Equal opportunity for all
-Work-life balance
-Great place for learning
-Extensive training

Fast paced target oriented organisation, good for entry level experience. 
They give primary exposure to sexual and reproductive health services delivery field
cons: Too much workload with a little pay. Not well organised. Do not have good work plan. Always compromising with quality
